```{r}
set.seed(0)
simulation <- UWBiost561::generate_partial_clique(
  n = 10,
  clique_fraction = 0.5,
  clique_edge_density = 0.9
)

adj_mat <- simulation$adj_mat

res <- UWBiost561::compute_maximal_partial_clique(
  adj_mat = adj_mat,
  alpha = 0.9
)
res
```
